metadata.Title: CVE-2023-2013 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - low
metadata.Description: An issue has been discovered in GitLab CE/EE affecting all versionsstarting from 1.2 before 15.10.8, all versions starting from 15.11 before15.11.7, all versions starting from 16.0 before 16.0.2. An issue was foundthat allows someone to abuse a discrepancy between the Web applicationdisplay and the git command line interface to social engineer victims intocloning non-trusted code.

criterions.comment: gitlab package in esm-apps/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
